name: Version 0.80s
description:
Version 0.80s is an outrun themed turn-based fps. Fight through ruthless robots until you run out of action points.

Tools used

Unreal 4.19

Blender

GIMP

Substance Designer

Bfxr

Bosca Ceoil

Things used

Outrun future 

https://www.dafont.com/de/outrun-future.font

Quantum

https://www.dafont.com/de/quantum-4.font

Neon 80s

https://www.dafont.com/de/neon-80s.font
